resources.string: When a song finishes automatically the next one begins. It also allows navigation between songs.
When the current song stops playing it will not continue to the next.
In this option you can change the view mode of the main view.
Allows downloading of both albums and songs only via WiFi connection.
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
Unable to download the song. Review the settings screen.
Track alredy exists in the downloads directory

string-array.name: lost_connection
string-array.item: The connection to the server has been lost. Please check your internet connection.

string-array.name: artist_without_data
string-array.item: Information related to that artist is not available

string-array.item: Information related to that playlist is not available
